title: Senior Auditor (External)
job_overview:
Performing audit fieldwork on engagements, including planning and completion. Charities and for profit entities. Cloud based audit software. All clients are New Zealand based.

Key Responsibilities:

Plan, execute, and complete audit engagements for a range of clients in accordance with auditing standards.

Review financial statements and reports, ensuring compliance with relevant accounting standards 

Identify audit issues and prepare management letter.

Maintain strong relationships with clients, responding promptly to their needs and queries.

Ensure completion of audit documentation to a high standard for review by managers and partners.
